page.title: 06WRAY EDUCATIONAL TRUST
page.content: An educational charity exists in Leven to assist the young people of the village. Since 1977 when the trust was first set up, many individuals and organisations within Leven have been assisted financially. Ten per cent of the Trust's income goes to fund activities of the Parochial Church Council, Sunday School & Leven Primary School. The School benefits tremendously as the Wray Trust supplies things which the Education Authority cannot normally supply. Most recently the Trust provided a second computer, photocopier & heat copier. The Wray Educational Trust is open to all residents who have lived in Leven for three or more years & who are under 25 years old. The money is specifically to benefit young people educationally.
